  • メソッド
util.time

クラス TimeControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.time.TimeControl

  • public class TimeControl
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages a date-time without the time-zone in the ISO-8601 calendar system expressed by the java.time.LocalDateTime class.

    TimeControl can express the current time, the time when specific processing was done, and the period of the two recorded time based on the object received in the LocalDateTime type.

    This class does not store or represent a time-zone. Instead, it is a description of the date, as used for birthdays, combined with the local time as seen on a wall clock. It cannot represent an instant on the time-line without additional information such as an offset or time-zone.

    The ISO-8601 calendar system is the modern civil calendar system used today in most of the world. It is equivalent to the proleptic Gregorian calendar system, in which today's rules for leap years are applied for all time. For most applications written today, the ISO-8601 rules are entirely suitable. However, any application that makes user of historical dates, and requires them to be accurate will find the ISO-8601 approach unsuitable.

    関連項目:
    LocalDateTime, Duration

    • メソッドの詳細

      • record

        public void record()
        Obtains the current time and holds it as one record. The time is obtained from the system clock of the default time-zone.

        The record created by this method will be retained until you intentionally delete it.

        Records are stored int the order in which they are recorded, and it is possible to retrieve them by specifying the order.

        Using this method will prevent the ability to use an alternate clock for testing because the clock is hard-corded.

      • getRecord

        public java.time.LocalDateTime getRecord()
                                  throws NotRecordException
        Take out one record.

        This method fetches the first record recorded by the makeRecord method.

        Even retrieving a record does not delete that record. So, unless you intentionally delete the retrieved record, this method will refer to the same record.

        If you do not want to use the retrieved record anymore, delete the record using the remove method.

        戻り値:
        The first recorded record among the stored records.
        例外:
        NotRecordException - If there is no record.

      • getRecord

        public java.time.LocalDateTime getRecord(int index)
                                  throws NotRecordException
        Take out one record.

        The argument specifies the record to be acquired in saved record. Even retrieving a record does not delete that record. So, unless you intentionally delete the retrieved record, this method will refer to the same record.

        If you do not want to use the retrieved record anymore, delete the record using the remove method.

        An exception is thrown if the argument is greater than the number of records stored.

        パラメータ:
        index - index of the element to return
        戻り値:
        The first recorded record among the stored records.
        例外:
        NotRecordException - If there is no record.

      • makeStartPoint

        public void makeStartPoint()
        Set the start point for calculating the duration. This is the same as the start when measuring time such as stopwatch.

        If you call this method with the start point already recorded, the start point that was originally recorded will be overwritten.

      • makeEndPoint

        public void makeEndPoint()
        Set the end point for calculating the duration. This is the same as the start when measuring time such as stopwatch.

        If you call this method with the end point already recorded, the end point that was originally recorded will be overwritten.

      • getDuration

        public java.time.Duration getDuration()
                               throws NullRecordException
        Calculate the duration from the start point and the end point.

        If the end point is newer than the start point, the calculation result is expressed in negative time.

        An exception is thrown if the start point is null or the end point is null.

        戻り値:
        Duration between start point and end point.
        例外:
        NullRecordException - If start point or end point is null.
